response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that the product holds an intrinsic value of $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to share in the excitement of seeing such a transformative tool in action within your organization. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
